scripts.publish: docker push tecnodesign/studio:v2 && docker push tecnodesign/studio:v2.0
scripts.build-alpine: docker build -t tecnodesign/alpine:latest git@github.com:capile/studio.git -f data/deploy/containers/alpine.dockerfile && docker push tecnodesign/alpine:latest
scripts.build-nginx: docker build -t tecnodesign/nginx:latest git@github.com:capile/studio.git -f data/deploy/containers/nginx.dockerfile    && docker push tecnodesign/nginx:latest
scripts.build-all: npm run build-alpine && npm run build-nginx && npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.test: docker run -it --rm -e STUDIO_ENV=test -v $PWD:/var/www/studio -u $UID tecnodesign/studio:v2 composer test
